response.answer_text: The answers to this question make me giggle. I don’t know if this was a serious question, but I’m going to answer it seriously. As far as we know, no, he isn’t, and I’m about 99% sure he isn’t, if we’re talking female to male transgender. And so far, unless he comes out as male to female transgender, or any other non-cisgender gender, he is not and uses male pronouns.I want to remind everyone that having abs and an Adam’s apple showing doesn’t prove the masculinity of a man, nor does the voice. Jimin can lower his voice actually quite impressively when speaking (as heard in Cleopatra games BTS has done). Just because he has abs doesn’t prove he’s a man . Also, plenty of women have Adam’s apple showing, it’s just not as often. Either way, no, he’s still not transgender.However, someone did show baby pictures of him in another answer, and yeah, basically, no, he isn’t. He was born male.Overall, Jimin is a beautiful human being. If he ever came out, I hope people would support him no matter what. Instead, what’s important is his hard work and dedication, the care and affection he has for others, and that fans love him for him.

NO. Good lord. There are embarrassingly cringe videos of his male anatomy bouncing around on the internet because hard stans don't know when they’ve crossed a line. Look, he did purposely put a bigender sign on his hand during a photoshoot and people have just decided to speak for him for some reason and interpret that action as if they were him. Only Jimin and maybe his close friends/family knows how he identifies gender wise but I’m almost 100% certain his junk is still there. And LGBTQ+ community, I am literally one of you, but y’all need to chill with this BTS is gay agenda. Assuming their sexualities to make yourself feel more comfortable in yours is immature and means you are not ready for sex much less to publicly speak on it. You also need to stop saying everyone who says BTS isn’t gay/trans/bi/etc is a homophobe. Assuming their sexuality whether it is straight, gay, pan , a ,etc is NOT okay and crossing a serious line. Y’all care way too much about people who are not you.
